snippet: The Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director, Sergei Filin, said at a news conference that he was on the way to a “full recovery” almost two months after he was severely burned in an acid attack in Moscow.
abstract: Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director, Sergei Filin, announces at news conference that he is on the way to full recovery almost two months after he was severely burned in an acid attack in Moscow.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY
byline.contributor: Sophia Kishkovsky contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director, Sergei Filin, said at a news conference that he was on the way to a “full recovery” almost two months after he was severely burned in an acid attack in Moscow.

headline.seo: Sergei Filin of Bolshoi Talks About Returning
headline.main: Bolshoi Director Is Upbeat About His Recovery
headline.print_headline: Bolshoi Director Is Upbeat About His Recovery
